Text: This thing works great... as a TRIAL USER!!!

I am not understanding were you are getting the trial user from. I have checked it on 4 differnet pc's using a flash drive, and they are all just fine. If you are having doubts about this being a full version. Open the program, go to the top right where you see the ? mark, click it, then in there go to "about" and you will see that all of the licenses say NEVER EXPIRE..:)
went one step further to comfirm it is full version..sent it to a friend, and the file showed full version for them to:) enjoy
